title: Mexican Irish Coffee
directions: Whip the cream with 1 teaspoon sugar until soft peaks form, set aside.
Combine remaining sugar, coffee, whiskey and tequila or Tia Maria.
Pour into mugs and top with lots of whipped cream.
ingredients: "Something different from your usual Irish Coffee, from Aprov√©cho."
1/4 cup tequila (your choice) or 1/4 cup Tia Maria ( your choice)
